title: South Africa to raise VAT for first time in 25 years to plug budget hole
text:
South Africa to raise VAT for first time in 25 years to plug budget hole 2:48pm EST - 01:59 
South Africa's new leadership announced on Wednesday it was taking the politically risky step of raising value-added tax for the first time in 25 years, part of efforts to cut the deficit and stabilize debt under new president Cyril Ramaphosa. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports.
